english.segment1: I give up i surrender,i throw in the town. Exposing my weakness to infinite power. with all of my weight, i lean heavy on you. with bags on my back,and in both my hands too
english.segment2: chorus. I fall, I fall on you. I fall, I fall on you
english.segment3: See my world keeps on spinning,out of control. And am dizzy from trying,to stand on my own. But you promised to catch me ,if i tumbled down
english.segment4: 'Cause the way to the sky,starts low to the ground
english.segment5: chorus. And i fall, fall on you. I fall, I fall on you
english.segment6: bridge. please dont move,please dont move,please dont move, From here, from here(4 times)
